div.p: Please enter a meaningful subject including the severity of the issue (low, medium, high, critical)
Make sure to answer the following questions:
div.pre:
Environment
* What server and database was used for testing? * What company (in multi-company setup) and user (or role) was used?
Steps to reproduce
* What is the high level process used? Please provide steps, for example:
* Go to Accounting/Vendors/Bills * Create new Vendor Bill or open vendor bill 123 * Problem when adding product line manually
Result
* What is the current result? If necessary, provide screenshot or complete error message
Expected Result
* What is the expected result?
